Literature.Title: Characterization of a Novel Antimicrobial Peptide Bacipeptin against Foodborne Pathogens
Literature.Author: Wei X, Hu Y, Sun C, Wu S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3090(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µg/ml),Bacillus cereus MCCC M25811(MIC=64µg/ml),Bacillus cereus CMCC 63301(MIC=32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis CCARM 5172(MIC=32µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes CGMCC 1.9136(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(no activity data),Escherichia coli O157:H7(no activity data),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis CGMCC 1.9136(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15692(no activity data)
